properties.entry: Includes (or excludes) certain columns from data.

This node allows to filter certain columns from the input table that are then hidden in the node's output. Use the buttons to move columns from the one list (Include or Exclude) to the other. To briefly describe the dialog settings:
This list contains the column names that are contained in the output table. The search field allows to find column names in this list.
Contains the names of the columns in the input table that are hidden in the output table.
